form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, FORM 1-131 ( (Rev. 3-1-74)

full_text: UNITED INAR4,992N2028 JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No 43-R0052. APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION FEE STAMP 81111 OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES as provided in section 223 of the 796 670 ,PA Immigration and Nationality Act Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball 1-point pen. TEL; G-100 issuance 10/21/74 I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME ChAN IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt NWI Card with this application if you checked "Issuance" above. C/O IN CARE OF MR. PASCHALL If you checked Extension' you must submit the reentry per- (No and Street) (Apt No.) mit you wish to have extended. MAILING 190.
